g.text: Mock system enables testing without external services:
• Supabase client mock with in-memory storage
• Auth state simulation for test scenarios
• Database fixture system with seed data
Single command transforms fork to branded project.
Auto-detect project settings and replacement targets.
Bulk update config files with new project name.
All key project files automatically updated.
Comprehensive mocks enable testing without externals.

svg.text: environment setup | service configuration | rebrand automation
